price: Shin kuma a lõkacin* da wata masĩfa, haƙĩƙa, ta sãme ku alhãli kuwa kun sãmar da biyunta, kun ce: "Daga ina wannan yake?" Ka ce: "Daga wurin rãyukanku** yake." Lalle ne, Allah, a kan dukan kõme, Mai ĩkon yi ne.
arabic: أَوَلَمَّآ أَصَٰبَتۡكُم مُّصِيبَةٞ قَدۡ أَصَبۡتُم مِّثۡلَيۡهَا قُلۡتُمۡ أَنَّىٰ هَٰذَاۖ قُلۡ هُوَ مِنۡ عِندِ أَنفُسِكُمۡۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
footnotes: * Duk masĩfar da ta sãme ku, tõ, ku ne kuka jãwo wa kanku ita da wani laifi na sãɓãwa umurnin Allah. Kuma kãmin masĩfa guda ta sãme ku, to, alheri biyu sun sãme ku. ** Kowace irin masĩfa ta sãmi mutum, to, shĩ ne ya yi sababinta a kansa. Kuma yã kamata ya yi bincike ya gãne sababin, a inda ya jãhilce shi. Kuma duk da haka kãmin masĩfa guda ta sãme shi, ya sãmi ni'ima biyu kõ fiye da haka.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: awalammā aṣābatkum muṣībatun qad aṣabtum mith'layhā qul'tum annā hādhā qul huwa min ʿindi anfusikum inna al-laha ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
